title: Carson Palmer's secret talent
text:
Carson Palmer shared a personal moment on Instagram this week. Post to Facebook Carson Palmer's secret talent Carson Palmer shared a personal moment on Instagram this week.   12news.com: http://12ne.ws/1L9jFG6   Join the Conversation To   Carson Palmer's secret talent Robby Baker , 12 Sports 2:39 p.m. MST October 2, 2015 Carson Palmer shared a personal moment on Instagram this week. Sep 27, 2015; Glendale, AZ, USA; Arizona Cardinals quarterback Carson Palmer (3) against the San Francisco 49ers at University of Phoenix Stadium. (Photo: Mark J. Rebilas-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Fans know Carson Palmer as the quarterback of the Arizona Cardinals, but he's also a father and has a hidden talent apparently. 
He shared a fun photo on Instagram this week, showcasing this secret skill. 
He's a hair dresser. A photo posted by Carson Palmer (@carsonpalmer3) on Oct 1, 2015 at 6:42pm PDT 
Okay, not really, but he did joke on the social media platform saying: "Blow dry game is on point. Who needs a blowout? #birdgang" 
So if you're a Cardinals fan who needs your hair done, maybe Palmer is the man to call. Read or Share this story: http://12ne.ws/1L9jFG6 TOP VIDEOS
